title: Ascharyachakit!
short_cast: Priyanka Bose, Vaibhav Raj Gupta, Santosh Juvekar, Anangsha Biswas, Ankit Raaj, Kashmira Irani, Kailash Waghmare, Vipin Sharma
cast: Priyanka Bose, Vaibhav Raj Gupta, Santosh Juvekar, Anangsha Biswas, Ankit Raaj, Kashmira Irani, Kailash Waghmare, Vipin Sharma
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies, Romantic Movies
desc: Entangling the lives of a movie star, a chauffeur, a prostitute and a pimp, this bold drama reveals ugly truths beneath Mumbai’s glitzy veneer.
